targets.query: SELECT sum("usage_kwh") FROM "electricity_consumption" WHERE $timeFilter AND location = '$location'
SELECT sum("total_cost_${vat}_vat_pence") / 100 FROM "electricity_consumption" WHERE $timeFilter AND location = '$location'
SELECT SUM("usage_kwh") / ((${__to} - ${__from}) / (1000*60*60*24)) FROM "electricity_consumption" WHERE $timeFilter AND location = '$location'
SELECT SUM("total_cost_${vat}_vat_pence") / ((${__to} - ${__from}) / (1000*60*60*24)) / 100 FROM "electricity_consumption" WHERE $timeFilter AND location = '$location'

SELECT
sum("usage_cost_${vat}_vat_pence")
/
sum("usage_kwh")
FROM "electricity_consumption" WHERE $timeFilter AND location = '$location'

SELECT
sum("total_cost_${vat}_vat_pence")
/
sum("usage_kwh")
FROM "electricity_consumption" WHERE $timeFilter AND location = '$location'
SELECT SUM("standing_charge_cost_${vat}_vat_pence") / 100 FROM "electricity_consumption" WHERE $timeFilter AND location = '$location' GROUP BY time($resolution) fill(none)
SELECT SUM("usage_cost_${vat}_vat_pence") / 100 FROM "electricity_consumption" WHERE $timeFilter AND location = '$location' GROUP BY time($resolution) fill(none)
SELECT SUM("usage_kwh") FROM "electricity_consumption" WHERE $timeFilter AND location = '$location' GROUP BY time($resolution) fill(none)

SELECT MIN("usage_kwh"), 
  "property_address_line_1"::tag, 
  "property_address_line_2"::tag,
  "property_address_line_3"::tag,
  "property_postcode"::tag
FROM "electricity_consumption"
WHERE $timeFilter AND location = '$location'
SELECT MEAN("unit_price_${vat}_vat_price")  FROM "electricity_pricing" WHERE time >= now() - 2d AND time < now() + 2d AND location = '$location' GROUP BY time(30m) fill(none)
SELECT MIN("unit_price_inc_vat_price"), "tariff_code"::tag   FROM "electricity_pricing" WHERE $timeFilter AND location = '$location'
SELECT MEAN("standing_charge_${vat}_vat_price")  FROM "electricity_pricing" WHERE $timeFilter AND location = '$location'
SELECT MEAN("unit_price_${vat}_vat_price")  FROM "electricity_pricing" WHERE $timeFilter AND location = '$location'
SELECT MEAN("unit_price_${vat}_vat_price")  FROM "electricity_pricing" WHERE $timeFilter AND location = '$location' GROUP BY time($resolution) fill(none)
SELECT MEAN("standing_charge_${vat}_vat_price")  FROM "electricity_pricing" WHERE $timeFilter AND location = '$location' GROUP BY time($resolution) fill(none)

SELECT
  sum("usage_cost_${vat}_vat_pence") / sum("usage_kwh")
FROM "electricity_consumption"
WHERE $timeFilter AND location = '$location'
GROUP BY time($resolution) fill(none)
SELECT sum("usage_kwh") FROM "gas_consumption" WHERE $timeFilter AND location = '$location'
SELECT SUM("usage_kwh") / ((${__to} - ${__from}) / (1000*60*60*24)) FROM "gas_consumption" WHERE $timeFilter AND location = '$location'
SELECT sum("total_cost_${vat}_vat_pence") / 100 FROM "gas_consumption" WHERE $timeFilter AND location = '$location'
SELECT SUM("total_cost_${vat}_vat_pence") / ((${__to} - ${__from}) / (1000*60*60*24)) / 100 FROM "gas_consumption" WHERE $timeFilter AND location = '$location'
SELECT SUM("standing_charge_cost_${vat}_vat_pence") / 100 FROM "gas_consumption" WHERE $timeFilter AND location = '$location' GROUP BY time($resolution) fill(none)
SELECT SUM("usage_cost_${vat}_vat_pence") / 100 FROM "gas_consumption" WHERE $timeFilter AND location = '$location' GROUP BY time($resolution) fill(none)
SELECT SUM("usage_kwh") FROM "gas_consumption" WHERE $timeFilter AND location = '$location' GROUP BY time($resolution) fill(none)

SELECT MIN("usage_kwh"), 
  "property_address_line_1"::tag, 
  "property_address_line_2"::tag,
  "property_address_line_3"::tag,
  "property_postcode"::tag
FROM "gas_consumption"
WHERE $timeFilter AND location = '$location'
SELECT MEAN("unit_price_${vat}_vat_price")  FROM "gas_pricing" WHERE $timeFilter AND location = '$location' GROUP BY time($resolution) fill(none)
SELECT MEAN("standing_charge_${vat}_vat_price")  FROM "gas_pricing" WHERE $timeFilter AND location = '$location' GROUP BY time($resolution) fill(none)
SELECT MIN("unit_price_inc_vat_price"), "tariff_code"::tag   FROM "gas_pricing" WHERE $timeFilter AND location = '$location'
SELECT MEAN("standing_charge_${vat}_vat_price")  FROM "gas_pricing" WHERE $timeFilter AND location = '$location'
SELECT MEAN("unit_price_${vat}_vat_price")  FROM "gas_pricing" WHERE $timeFilter AND location = '$location'
